description:
Here at The Law Offices of David A. Kadzai, LLC, in Chicago, Illinois, we provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients across our region who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. Focusing solely on personal injury and wrongful death, the attorneys at our law firm have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our clients.

During our time in practice, we have become one of our area's premier law offices for those adversely affected by any of the following:

  • Nursing home abuse and neglect
  • Medical malpractice
  • Car accidents
  • Truck accidents
  • Bike and pedestrian accidents
  • Police brutality and civil rights violations
  • Other preventable tragedies

Led by experienced attorney David A. Kadzai, the attorneys at our law firm will sit with you and discuss all your options to help you make the best-informed decisions. Completely devoted to your success, we will devise the most effective strategy possible to increase the likelihood that you will obtain the maximum amount of compensation you need, and you can rely on us to fight hard to help you obtain the justice you deserve.

Honored for our exemplary professionalism and unwavering dedication to our clients, our attorneys have earned Top 100 Trial Lawyer designations from The National Trial Lawyers. Furthermore, we have received Superb client ratings on Avvo as well as numerous testimonials and referrals from those we have served.

To begin the process of seeking the full amount of finances you need to cover your medical bills and lost wages as well as your pain and suffering, you can contact The Law Offices of David A. Kadzai, LLC, by phone or through our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation. We also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe in today's uncertain environment.
